show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: My guest filmmaker Kevin P. Miller, creator of Generation Rx, talks with me about living a good life as a reformer.  Be inspired directing your life to make the choices you believe in.   You may not become rich and famous, but you will be satisfied with and deeply grateful for your life.   I strongly recommend this hour to everyone who wants to really live.
